content:
What if I just admit it? 
Out loud, right here, right now
that I’m angry? Afraid to believe 
in a God that allows this shit,
in a disorder that hides this shit
from x-rays, from blood tests,
and worst of all, from me
but convince kinfolk that it
don’t exist in our community.
All the while, I’m paying the toll
at every breakdown on this
gloriously messy,
infinitely endless
emotional highway.
